title: How come i can't buy Skin boosts in aram.
body: i have about 330 RP and my fiancee wanted a skin boost in some arams, but it wouldnt let me at all. any1 know y

replies.body: Skin boosts are currently disabled, but the [server page ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)will be providing updates on its status.  It's really cool that you and your fiance want to give out some boosts, and hopefully you'll be able to do that shortly.  Until then, best of luck in your ARAMs!
